sentences.en: A long scream sounded from somewhere above.
sentences.cn: 从上面什么地方传来一声长长的尖叫。

sentences.en: A piercing scream split the air.
sentences.cn: 刺耳的尖叫声划破长空。

sentences.en: a screaming baby
sentences.cn: 尖声哭叫的婴儿

sentences.en: After the first few shots, people started screaming.
sentences.cn: 几声枪响过后，人们开始尖叫起来。

sentences.en: He gave out a scream of pain.
sentences.cn: 他疼得大叫了一声。

sentences.en: He was dragged kicking and screaming to a nearby van.
sentences.cn: 他又踢又叫着被拖到附近的一辆小货车上。

sentences.en: Her lips parted in a soundless scream.
sentences.cn: 她张开嘴想喊，但喊不出声来。

sentences.en: Hilda let out a scream.
sentences.cn: 希尔达发出一声尖叫。

sentences.en: His mouth was a little open, as if he'd started to scream.
sentences.cn: 他的嘴微微张开,似乎是要开始尖叫.

sentences.en: His voice rose almost to a scream.
sentences.cn: 他提高了嗓门，几乎在尖叫。

sentences.en: If I hear one more joke about my hair, I shall scream.
sentences.cn: 如果我再听到有人拿我的头发开玩笑，我就会尖叫。

sentences.en: If you don't leave this instant, I will scream.
sentences.cn: 你要是不马上离开, 我就喊了.

sentences.en: Its headlines were suitably downbeat and don't scream out.
sentences.cn: 其标题平淡无奇而非触目惊心，非常得体。

sentences.en: Lou prattled on about various trivialities till I wanted to scream.
sentences.cn: 卢就各种芝麻小事唠叨个没完，后来我烦得都想尖叫了。

sentences.en: She began to scream blue murder (= scream very loudly ) .
sentences.cn: 她开始高声尖叫。

sentences.en: She heard the sirens scream their unearthly wail.
sentences.cn: 她听到警报器发出可怕的尖叫声。

sentences.en: She wanted to scream, but her vocal cords seemed paralysed.
sentences.cn: 她想尖叫，但她的声带好像不听使唤了。

sentences.en: She was screaming her head off (= screaming a lot ) .
sentences.cn: 她不停地尖叫。

sentences.en: The children were screaming with laughter .
sentences.cn: 小孩子们在尖声欢笑。

sentences.en: The pain is often so bad she wants to scream.
sentences.cn: 剧烈的疼痛常常让她想大声叫喊。

sentences.en: There was a scream of brakes from the carriageway outside.
sentences.cn: 外面车行道上传来刺耳的刹车声。

sentences.en: We heard screams coming from the flat.
sentences.cn: 我们听到公寓里传出尖叫声。

words.tran_cn: 尖叫的；使人惊叹的；使人捧腹大笑的
尖声叫喊的人；令人惊叹的事；惊叹符号；耸人听闻的标题
尖叫；大笑；呼啸着前进（scream的ing形式）
尖叫声；尖锐刺耳的声音；极其滑稽可笑的人

trans.tran_en: a loud high sound that you make with your voice because you are hurt, frightened, excited etc

trans.tran_cn: 尖叫，惊呼，发出刺耳声音
trans.tran_en: to make a loud high noise with your voice because you are hurt, frightened, excited etc

trans.tran_cn: (因恐惧、疼痛、兴奋等)尖声大叫
trans.tran_en: to make a loud high noise with your voice because you are hurt, frightened, excited etc
